Video Sales Letter Concepts:

You will learn the theory behind why selling with this medium is more effective than traditional long form text-only sales letters. 

How to Write Your Video Sales Letter:

Yes, it is a VIDEO sales letter, but you’ll be recording plenty of text on your screen.  So preparing the written word and script of your letter is critical.  There is a well-defined process that a viewer of your video sales letter must be taken through.  You’ll learn how to use emotions and logic to drive your sales results – when to “tease” the viewer and when to push.
